word:
I feel the tenderest compassion for you. I would give my life to the torture and death if it would save your soul. But you have the experience of others who have walked in the same pathway where you have set your feet. You have traced their history who have despised counsel and made of none effect the testimonies. Why not change this order of things before it is too late, 
                                                                           603
everlasting too late. You cannot make right wrong or truth error, neither can you make error truth and wrong right.
